sampleDescriptions: FTC Oversight, Advertising & Privacy Related issues
General Advocacy

Issues relating to the portrayals of women and girls in advertising
Digital economy/content issues and online privacy, H.R. 2520 Browser Act
Digital Advertising / Apps
